title: After DeepSeek, NVIDIA Puts Its Focus on Inference at GTC
author: Frederic Lardinois
description: To speed up inferencing and drive down the cost in the data center, NVIDIA announced several new accelerators at GTC, its annual conference.
cntitle: 在 GTC 大会上，继 DeepSeek 之后，NVIDIA 将重点放在推理上
cndescription: 为了加速推理并降低数据中心的成本，NVIDIA在其年度大会GTC上发布了几款新的加速器。
